Rabbit Foot Charm

miscellaneous (lvl 0)

item id [id]: 266
(twist-fate [twistfate])

Requires 5S to forge (S1)

The rabbit foot is a symbol of good luck. Once per month the luck from the rabbit foot will be able negate an attack that should otherwise have injured its wearer. The attack can be negated even outside of combat, but the amulet does not protect against attacks that cause instant death.
